title: Lots of room to call your own! Spacious Studio bed! Beautiful neighborhood!
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at The Covington Apartments, located at 5800 American Blvd W Bloomington, MN 55437.', 'Description', '........', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', 'The Covington is in a great location near popular attractions and with easy access to I-494, Hwy 5 & public transportation.', "We're just 13 miles south of Minneapolis and 22 miles southwest of St. Paul.", "Take a ten-minute stroll and you'll be at the Normandale Lake Bandshell, which holds fun outdoor concerts and events.", "If you're more into cultural activities, check out the nearby Bloomington Center for the Arts where you'll find theaters, art galleries, art classrooms and more.", 'Like the water?', 'Bush Lake Beach is the perfect spot for canoeing, swimming, exploring trails or just laying out on the sand.', "If you're looking for a pet-friendly community with a variety of nearby activities, then check out Covington Apartment Homes today.", 'We have several different open floor plans that are sure to fit your lifestyle needs.', 'Contact Weidner Apartment Homes to check availability and learn about our leasing options.', 'Our amazing staff is excited to help you and your family become the newest residents of Bloomington, MN!', 'show contact info', 'Bedrooms', '........... Studio', 'Bathrooms', '......... 1', 'Sq Footage', '......... 536 sq ft', 'Unit Price', '........... $1475 - $1505/Month', 'Lease Term', '........', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Amenity List', '......', '− Cardio Machines', '− Coffee Station', '− Conference Room', '− Courtyard', '− Disposal Chutes', '− Elevator', '− Movie Theater', '− Pond', '− Rooftop Lounge', '− Weight Machines', '− Corporate Suites', '− Dry Cleaning Service', '− Fitness Programs/Classes', '− Furnished Units Available', '− Kingsley Excellence Award', '− Maintenance on Site', '− Package Receiving', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '− Yoga Classes Offered', 'Unit Features', '.....', '− Floor to Ceiling Windows', '− Full-Size Washer/Dryer in Every Home', '− Garbage Disposal', '− Granite Islands In Kitchen', '− Kitchen Island', '− Maple Cabinetry', '− Patio/Balcony', '− Sliding Glass Doors', '− Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '− Walk-In Closets', 'Our Pet Policy', '...', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Leasing Hours', '...', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Call our Office', '... at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a private tour today.', 'Our Location', '.....', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Professionally managed by Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A56CC6D3E8D240']
